column5: Part of the boat prep this week I guess. Lamintaor at work can get a workout. can some one post the logo in a good size? for people to print out?
I have tones of tapes with the OFC logo on it..... see here....    at:  OFC Store
I love the OFC measeurement sticker for the front of the boat, Or the OFC stick on my tackle box, OFC hat, OFC flag ..  Wait, I am a boating billboard what about the sponsership money!!!
Try and justify it all you wish, it is what it is.
I don't recall having to justify anything..to you or anyone else. The OFAH was quite glad to allow this.

You've gotta add 2008 to it Darren according to the new modified rules... Like has been mentioned above... we're getting toooo serious with this thing. OFC apparel was just fine the first round. You write 2008 on it this year... you gonna peel it off the boat next year?
